title: Software Developer
description: Join our dynamic technology team at Liquid Telecom Zambia where you'll work on cutting-edge solutions that drive digital transformation across Zambia. As a Software Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining software applications using modern technologies. Our organization values innovation, collaboration, and continuous learning in a fast-paced environment that embraces agile methodologies and development practices. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality solutions that meet business requirements while adhering to coding standards and best practices. This role offers opportunities to work on diverse projects ranging from web applications to mobile solutions, contributing to Zambia's growing tech ecosystem. You will participate in the full software development lifecycle from requirements gathering to deployment and maintenance, ensuring robust and scalable applications. We provide a supportive environment with mentorship programs and professional development opportunities to help you grow your career in technology.
key_responsibilities: Design and develop software applications; Write clean, efficient code; Participate in code reviews; Collaborate with team members; Troubleshoot and debug applications; Document technical specifications
required_skills: JavaScript, Python, Java, SQL, Git, REST APIs, Agile methodologies
preferred_skills: React, Node.js, AWS, Docker, TypeScript, CI/CD
benefits: Health insurance, NAPSA pension, Annual leave, Training budget
growth_opportunities: Career advancement to senior roles, Technical training, Conference attendance

title: Senior Full Stack Developer
description: Zamtel is seeking a senior Full Stack Developer to join our innovative technology team driving Zambia's digital connectivity. As a Senior Full Stack Developer, you will architect and implement scalable web applications serving thousands of customers across the nation. You'll lead development initiatives using React, Node.js, and cloud technologies while mentoring junior team members. This role involves collaborating with product managers to define technical requirements and ensuring code quality through comprehensive testing and code reviews. You will optimize application performance and security while implementing CI/CD pipelines for efficient deployment. Our environment encourages technical leadership and innovation in solving complex challenges in Zambia's telecommunications sector.
key_responsibilities: Lead full-stack development projects; Architect scalable solutions; Mentor junior developers; Conduct code reviews; Optimize application performance; Implement security measures
required_skills: React, Node.js, MongoDB, AWS, Docker, Git, REST APIs
preferred_skills: Kubernetes, GraphQL, TypeScript, Microservices, Jenkins, Redis
